author: Christopher Woody
title: 'Here comes this Russian hot dog': The story behind a Navy warship's dangerous encounter with Russian fighter jets
description: After Russia's seizure of Crimea in 2014, encounters between Russian and NATO forces became more frequent and, in many cases, less safe. One such encounter between Russian aircraft and the USS Donald Cook in 2016 was the "most aggressive" by the Russians in s…
content:
When the Navy destroyer USS Donald Cook sailed into the Baltic Sea in April 2016, it had been more than two years since Russia seized Crimea from Ukraine.
Tensions between Russia and its NATO and European neighbors were still high, and the intervening period… [+6481 chars]
